embeds.title: ID Verification Process
embeds.description: ID verification is optional but grants you trusted status in the server.

fields.name: Benefits of Being ID Verified
fields.value:
1. Trusted status in the server.
2. Granted the Member (ID Verified) (ID verified) role.

fields.name: Note
fields.value: ID verification doesn't grant instant NSFW access; it's your choice.

fields.name: Requirements
fields.value:
Your ID book/card, driver's license, or passport
A piece of paper
Pen

fields.name: Verified in Another Server
fields.value: If verified in a partnered server, skip by providing proof.

fields.name: What happens if verification fails?
fields.value: In case of issues such as revealing all personal information, blurry images, etc, you'll be asked to re-verify.

fields.name: Data Handling
fields.value: Pictures and documents are deleted after successful or denied verification.

steps: Send an image of the piece of paper with your username and today's date written

Now send a picture of your ID, passport, or Learner's/Driver's license. A birth certificate is not valid for verification. Make sure you have covered all sensitive information except your date of birth.

For faster verification, you can include your face
